text: yahlifune billahi ma kalu. velekad kalu kelimete-lkufri vekeferu ba`de islamihim vehemmu bima lem yenalu. vema nekamu illa en agnahumu-llahu verasuluhu min fadlih. feiy yetubu yeku hayral lehum. veiy yetevellev yu`azzibhumu-llahu `azaben elimen fi-ddunya vel'ahirah. vema lehum fi-l'ardi miv veliyyiv vela nesir
